Yes, you read that right â€” Sydnee in Sydney!

Sydnee is a digital designer from California USA, now based in Sydney AU. She graduated from the University of California, Davis with a Bachelor of Arts in Design and minor in Professional Writing. Organisations she has worked with include Woolworths Group (WooliesX), United Cellars, UC Davis School of Law, and Bangarra Dance Theatre.

When she logs off, you might find her in the pottery studio, tending to her houseplants, or playing with her foster cats.

Work Experience

  • Digital Designer for WooliesX and Woolworths Supermarkets
  • Mid-Level Graphic Designer for United Cellars
  • Graphic Designer for UC Davis School of Law
  • Design Director for The California Aggie
  • Layout Artist for The California Aggie
  • Design Associate for Design Interactive
  • Director of Graphic Design for Open Ceilings Literary Magazine
  • Digital Media Intern for Bangarra Dance Theatre's digital storytelling platform Knowledge Ground
  • Assistant Graphic Director for UC Davis Picnic Day

Education

  • Bachelor of Arts in Design
  • Minor in Professional Writing
